title: Qalb Loz√©
description: An ancient place, located in modern Syria, with remains of an ancient basilica. Inscribed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2011 as part of the "Ancient Villages of Northern Syria."

properties.description: Location of the remains of the Church in Qalb Loze. Coordinates determined by eye in Google Earth in November 2012, following description in UNESCO World Heritage List.
properties.title: Remains of the Church in Qalb Loze
